mapper.select: select * from product where product_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from product where product_country like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update product set product_banner=1 where product_number=#{product_number}
mapper.select: select product_number, product_name, product_country, product_stay_days, product_size, product_readcount, product_average_score, product_banner from product order by product_number asc
mapper.update: update product set product_banner=0 where product_number=#{product_number}
mapper.select: select product_photo_filename from product_photo where product_number=#{product_number} order by product_photo_number asc
